data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Southern Leyte, Philippines today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Southern Leyte, Philippines
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Southern Leyte you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Southern Leyte, Philippines.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Southern Leyte to agree with you and with one another.
Pour your Spirit out on the 91,200 citizens of Southern Leyte, Philippines, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 12,704 believers in the state of Southern Leyte to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Southern Leyte, Philippines to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 78,496 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Southern Leyte, Philippines, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.section_summary:
the state of Southern Leyte, Philippines has a population of 91,200.

We estimate Southern Leyte has 12,704 people who might know Jesus, 70,256 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 8,240 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.
